mapper.select: SELECT a.id, c.`name`, c.unit_name AS unitName, c.highest_edu AS highestEdu, c.research_direction AS researchDirection, c.project, a.s_star AS sStar FROM t_billboard_talent_related AS a LEFT JOIN t_billboard AS b ON a.billboard_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_talent_pool AS c ON a.talent_id = c.id WHERE a.billboard_id = #{billboardId} ORDER BY a.create_at DESC

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.unit_name AS unitName , b.start_at AS startAt, b.end_at AS endAt, a.s_star AS sStar, b.categories, b.tech_keys AS techKeys FROM t_billboard_talent_related AS a LEFT JOIN t_billboard AS b ON a.billboard_id = b.id WHERE a.talent_id = #{talentId} ORDER BY a.s_star DESC

SELECT a.launch_user_name AS launchUserName, a.launch_user_id AS launchUserId, a.`mode`, a.type, a.detail, a.effect_at AS effectAt, a.`status`, a.id FROM t_collaborate AS a WHERE a.launch_user_id = #{talentId} OR a.pid = #{talentId} order by effect_at desc

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.amount, b.tech_keys AS techKeys, a.s_star AS sStar FROM t_billboard_talent_related AS a LEFT JOIN t_billboard AS b ON a.billboard_id = b.id WHERE a.talent_id = #{talentId} ORDER BY a.create_at DESC

SELECT b.id, b.`name`, b.photo, b.professional, b.unit_name AS unitName, b.research_direction AS researchDirection
FROM t_billboard_talent_related AS a LEFT JOIN t_talent_pool AS b ON a.talent_id = b.id WHERE b.status = 1 AND a.billboard_id = #{billboardId} ORDER BY a.s_star DESC LIMIT 1
